alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:03PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
